articles.content: Pedram Mousavi's work is all about detail, so his vision must be sharp. The luxury auto detailing studio owner says in addition to looking at glossy reflective paints, he spends hours staring at his … [+7307 chars]

articles.author: Allison Aubrey
articles.title: Unraveling a hidden cause of UTIs — plus how to prevent them - WUSF Public Media
articles.description: New research shows that one of the most common infections in women may be linked to our food supply. Here's what to know to protect yourself.
articles.content: If you've had a urinary tract infection, you're in good company. About 60% of women will develop one in their lifetime. UTIs lead to more than a million emergency room visits each year and more than … [+10046 chars]
